resources.string: How to use this plug in
Your email account username\n i.e. user@gmail.com
Your email account password. This plug in will never store passwords
Email recipients. Multiple recipients can be designated by placing a comma between addresses\n i.e. p1@aol.com, p2@aol.com
Email subject line. Can be left blank
Email body. Can be left blank

Email attachment files. Multiple files can be designated by placing a comma between files. The default directory is the local storage directory. Examples:\n Downloads/file1.pdf\n DCIM/pic1.jpg,DCIM/pic2.jpg
All Tasker variables are supported in any field.\n i.e. %BATT in body will display battery percentage in email body
